statements: DELETE FROM email_marketing_campaign WHERE customer_id = 100 AND send_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM email_marketing_campaign WHERE campaign_id = 100 AND customer_id = 500
DELETE FROM email_marketing_campaign WHERE preference_1 = 'Sales' OR preference_2 = 'Specials'
DELETE FROM campaign_responses WHERE response_id = 100 AND response_action = 'Clicked';
DELETE FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price > 1000;
DELETE FROM campaign_subscribers WHERE campaign_id IN (SELECT campaign_id FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01');
